name: THE LEGEND OF A SCARF
description:
ARE YOU GOOD AT PLATFORM GAMES ?

  • Test your ability by progressing throw a strange world in  8bit aesthetic..
  • Fight in dangerous lands filled by monsters and daemons ..
  • Find gold to increase your health and power ..
  • Beat all bosses who threaten the worlds ..
  • Take your time and be patient, your journey may be difficult ..

-SO PLAY THE DEMO !!
